Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_YunYangBegin
Text.Desc: As [NAME] was nurtured by [HENAME] something special happened.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_YunYangEnd
Text.Desc: As [NAME] finished nurturing [HENAME] something special happened.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_Chance
Text.Desc: There was a slight change in intelligence while [NAME] was growing.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_Grow
Text.Desc: As the Spirit Root finished maturing, the Qi throughout heaven and earth suddenly changed, something special happened.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_Ripe
Text.Desc: There was some sort of sudden reaction on heaven and earth as the Spirit Root ripened, something special happened.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_LingSha
Text.Desc: [NAME]'s evil spirit reached an extreme stage and then something happened.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_Attack
Text.Desc: The Spirit Root was ripe, something big must be about to happen, get ready.
